verses.verse: Then the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of households of the <S%H1>Levites<s%> <S%H3881>approached<s%> <S%H5066>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H499>priest<s%> and <S%H3548>Joshua<s%> the <S%H3091>son<s%> of <S%H1121>Nun<s%> and the <S%H5126>heads<s%> of households of the <S%H7218>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1>sons<s%> of <S%H4294>Israel.<s%>

And they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in, with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> for our <S%H929>cattle.<s%>"

So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H413>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out for the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who were of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H1961>received<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H8099>Simeonites<s%> and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

And the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> received <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> from the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> and from the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> received <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> from the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> and from the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> received <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are [here] <S%H7121>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon;<s%>

and they were for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> one of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> for the <S%H1486>lot<s%> was <S%H1992>theirs<s%> <S%H7223>first.<s%>

Thus they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them Kiriath-arba, [Arba being] the father of <S%H1>Anak<s%> (that is, <S%H6061>Hebron<s%>), in the <S%H2275>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H2022>Judah,<s%> with its <S%H3063>surrounding<s%> <S%H5439>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands.<s%>

But the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> and its <S%H9161>villages,<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> as his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

So to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> and <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
and <S%H3492>Jattir<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
and <S%H2473>Holon<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H1688>Debir<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>

and <S%H5871>Ain<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H3194>Juttah<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> [and] Beth-shemesh with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> from <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>
And from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H1387>Geba<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
<S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H5960>Almon<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands.<s%>

Then the <S%H5892>cities<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were <S%H1486>allotted<s%> to the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> [even to] the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
and <S%H6911>Kibzaim<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and Beth-horon with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
And from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H514>Elteke<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H1405>Gibbethon<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
<S%H357>Aijalon<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> Gath-rimmon with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And from the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> [they allotted] <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and Gath-rimmon with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> for the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were <S%H6235>ten.<s%>

And to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> one of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> from the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> [they gave] <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> and Be-eshterah with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> [they gave] <S%H7191>Kishion<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H1705>Daberath<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
<S%H3412>Jarmuth<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> En-gannim with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> [they gave] <S%H4861>Mishal<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
<S%H2520>Helkath<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> [they gave] <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and Hammoth-dor with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H7178>Kartan<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands.<s%>

And to the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> [they gave] from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H3362>Jokneam<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H7177>Kartah<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands.<s%>
<S%H1829>Dimnah<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H5096>Nahalal<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> [they gave] <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
<S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H4158>Mephaath<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> [they gave] <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
<S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in <S%H3605>all.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> [these were] the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> and their <S%H1486>lot<s%> was <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were forty-eight <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5892>each<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> its <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> [it was] with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to their fathers, and they <S%H1>possessed<s%> it and <S%H3423>lived<s%> in it.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5117>gave<s%> them <S%H5117>rest<s%> on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that He had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to their fathers, and <S%H1>no<s%> <S%H3808>one<s%> of <S%H376>all<s%> their <S%H3605>enemies<s%> <S%H340>stood<s%> <S%H5975>before<s%> them; the <S%H6440>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>gave<s%> <S%H5414>all<s%> their <S%H3605>enemies<s%> into their <S%H340>hand.<s%>

Not <S%H1697>one<s%> of the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>promises<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>made<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5307>failed;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H935>pass.<s%>
